title: P's & Q's
content:
Are my eyes crooked or are the descender of _q_’s slightly shorter then that of the _p_’s? It is quite striking with strong serifs such as slab serifs. Try Clarendon for exemple and tell me if you also see this!

 [‹ Sans to accompany esta?](http://web.archive.org/web/20080705145148/http:/www.typophile.com/node/17555 "Go to previous forum topic") [Need a similar font of echelon ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080705145148/http:/www.typophile.com/node/17532 "Go to next forum topic")
